title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
Welcome to Take Home Today blog!

Take Home Today is a reflective practice where I capture and document the interesting discoveries, valuable lessons, and insights I encounter each day. It encourages mindfulness and awareness of daily experiences, prompting me to appreciate the nuances of life, learn from them, and share these reflections with others. This concept fosters a habit of continuous learning and personal growth, making it a meaningful way to engage with the world around us. Take something home today!

title: Statistics today
text:
Pareto Chart

A pareto chart is bar graph with bars arranged by their heights in descending order.


To make a Pareto chart, arrange the bars according to their heights such that the bar with the largest height appears first on the left side, and then subsequent bars are arranged in descending order with the smallest height appearing last on the right side.

title: About
text:
Take Home Today
Welcome to “Take Home Today”! I’m Moses Otieno, and this blog is my little corner of the internet where I share the fascinating discoveries, valuable lessons, and enlightening realizations I encounter each day.
In our fast-paced world, it’s easy to overlook the small moments that hold the potential for growth and understanding. This blog is dedicated to capturing those insights—from the extraordinary to the everyday. Whether it’s a thought-provoking book I’ve read, a unique experience, or a conversation that sparked new ideas, I aim to create a space for reflection and connection.
I believe that every day offers something worth pondering, and I invite you to join me on this journey. Let’s explore together, share insights, and perhaps even inspire each other along the way.
Thank you for being here!

title: On subject of divorce
text:
Moses did not issue a command on the subject of divorce as the Pharisees put it. Moses permitted it. It was because of their hardness of hearts. It therefore means that divorce is not mandatory. Divorce is therefore choice. God did not command it.

Matthew 19:3-11

title: Statistics
text: Introductory statistics by Prem S. Mann is a good statistical book for an introduction to statistics.
